iiv.io

Class CNUFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • iiv.io.CNUFile

  • public class CNUFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to support standard file ativities with local and URL files the class cannot be reset after construction so there is no reason to clone or synchronize

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Create a new instance of CNUFile
